effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.3 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 628,726.
Set: When you cast Healing Rain, 1 ally in the radius has Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Use: Channel to store 50,429 mana in the Ingenious Mana Battery, up to a max of 201,715. (1 Min Cooldown)

Equip: While your mana is above 50%, gain 837 Versatility, increased by up to 100% by the mana stored in the battery. While your mana is under 50%, siphon 50,429 mana every 5 sec from the Ingenious Mana Battery into your mana pool.

name: Noggenfogger Ultimate Deluxe

spells.description: Use: Summons a Blackwater Pirate to aid you in combat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: With an elixir as unpredictable as Noggenfogger's, you never know if to expect pirates or confusion.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
